name: Liam
sort_details: Friendly delivery drivers and good communication
details_review: We have had 2 fruit and veg deliveries now and have been really pleased with the variety and quality. Friendly delivery drivers and good communication over Facebook üëçüèªüòä

name: Noah
sort_details: FLocal produce ¬∑ Great selection - Fresh food
details_review: We have just had our first box delivered, absolutely delighted. The fruit and veg smell great and look wonderful, really pleased. The delivery was fast, food packed well and we will use again.

name: Olive
details_review: Thank you so much for your wonderful service as you so kindly changed the ordered items. I am a firm believer of supporting local businesses and using local produce at every opportunity.

name: Elijah
sort_details: Easily ordered online and delivered quickly.
details_review: Lovely fruit box - easily ordered online and delivered quickly. Great service. Thank you so much

name: William
sort_details: The quality and freshness are excellent.
details_review: I live in Wales but wanted to send a gift to my mum. She received her fruit hamper plus some extras this morning and was really pleased. The quality and freshness are excellent. Thank you so much x

name: James
details_review: Thank you for the dairy and veg box delivered today. All delivered completely contact free. Every looks lovely and excellent quality. 5* service.
